author: Staff Reporter
text:
A fisherman from Veerampattinam died after he tripped and fell into a marsh while allegedly fleeing from police at Nallavadu near here on Wednesday night. The deceased has been identified as Vimal (33), a resident of Shivaji Nagar in Veerampattinam. He accidentally fell in the marsh between Panithittu and Nallavadu villages, while being chased by police personnel.

His body was recovered by the Thavalakuppam police
title: Fisherman falls into marsh, dies
